snippet.title: The Sims 3 Pets Expansion Pack - PC Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch this trailer of The Sims 3 Expansion Pack* (coming to WIN/MAC October 18, 2011) to see how you can create perfect—or imperfect—pets for your Sims, from fierce guard dogs to destructive kittens to trusty horses as you determine their looks—and personality traits. Treat your Sims and their pets to an exclusive venue filled with unique objects found only in the Limited Edition. With a variety of new activities and social interactions, take control of your Sims' pets to discover surprising new ways to play with life! 
See if you can catch a few surprising we have in store for you in this trailer. 

*Requires The Sims 3 to play.
